segments.text: Miss Wang , would you mind my asking you a personal question ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , not at all . Go ahead .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Frankly yes . We like to employ married people . By the way , do you have any children ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have a three-year-old son .
segments.speaker: S2
